workflow.name: db2
workflow.longdesc: Configure an IBM DB2 database resource, along with a Virtual IP and a Filesystem. Note that the filesystem will be stopped initially, in case you need to run mkfs.

parameters.stepdesc: The ID specified here is for the DB2 cluster resource. A resource group will be created with the same ID prefixed by g-. The instance is the name of the DB2 instance user.

parameter.name: id
parameter.longdesc: Unique ID for the database resource in the cluster.

parameter.name: instance
parameter.longdesc: Instance user name. This must be created as specified in the DB2 documentation.

template.name: virtual-ip
template.stepdesc: The IP address configured here will start before the DB2 instance.

template.name: filesystem
template.stepdesc: The filesystem configured here will be mounted before the DB2 instance.

workflow.crm_script:
primitive ocf:heartbeat:db2 \ op monitor interval="30" timeout="60" start-delay="10" \ op start interval="0" timeout="120" \ op stop interval="0" timeout="120" \ params instance="" group g-
meta target-role="stopped"
